text: Now I know what to do with old FitBit. <http://sipping.coffee/2014/10/29/cat-fitbit-fitness-tracking/>

attachments.title: Fitbit Fitness Tracker on a Cat — Java's Story
attachments.text: In 2013, I was the first person to put a Fitbit on my cat to track his steps! A year later, check out Java cat's fitness tracking Fitbit statistics.
attachments.fallback: sipping coffee: Fitbit Fitness Tracker on a Cat — Java's Story
